item.title: Solus i3wm configuration
item.description: I just tried new window manager and did a log. This log may be useful for others :). Most of the config files I downloaded from the net and I just modified it. Dotfiles = Solus i3 config dotfiles Hope i uploaded everything if anything missing please do let me know. eopkg install These are the main packages to install i3wm sudo eopkg it i3 i3blocks dunst rofi feh compton xprop lxappearance xkill font-awesome-4 fontawesome fontawesome for font icons copy the .
